setup_script_description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox
task: navigate forwards by ten options in listbox popup
specific_user_instruction: with focus on the listbox popup, navigate forwards by ten options.
output_assertions: Text of the focused option in the popup ('Grape') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (not selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (11) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
